WaitlistParticipant.name: WaitlistParticipant
WaitlistParticipant.description: Represents a customer who is added to a waitlist.

AcceptanceTime.description: The date and time the service resource accepts the appointment request of the waitlist participant. This field is available in API version 59.0 and later.

Description.description: The description of the waitlist participant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the waitlist participant record was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the waitlist participant record was last viewed.

ParticipantId.description: The ID of the participant that's associated as a parent for the service appointment.

RelatedRequestId.description: This field is a relationship field.

ParticipantIdentifier.description: The alphanumeric unique identifier of the participant in a waitlist. For example, D101, E63, A5015

ServiceAppointmentId.description: The ID of the service appointment that’s related to the waitlist participant.

ServiceResourceId.description: The ID of the service resource that’s related to the service appointment for the waitlist participant.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: This field is a relationship field.

WaitlistId.description: The ID of the Waitlist that’s related to the participant.

WorkTypeId.description: The ID of the work type that's associated with the service appointment.
